message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this fantastic item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $75.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but I can only go up to $70 right now. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $72.50. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
